CIRCULAR  NO   10 / 2001 
 
 
Sub :   Security functions of airlines not to be entrusted to private 
agencies /contractual persons. 
 
 
 
In continuation to this Bureau Circular No 19/1999 all concerned shall follow 
dated 01.11.1999 on the subject cited above the following instructions: - 
 
(i) 
No airlines shall engage trainees from any institutions for performing 
ground handling or security related functions. 
 
(ii) 
No security related functions should be    entrusted to a contractual person 
or the person who is not working directly on the pay role of the concerned 
airlines. 
 
(iii) 
In case of any violation or contravention to the above directions airlines 
concerned shall be held responsible and legal action against such airlines 
may be initiated. 
 
(iv) 
The above instructions may be brought to the notice of all airlines for 
strict compliance on priority basis. 
 
 (R.K.Singh) 
Additional Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
REF. NO.CAS-7(29)/99/Div-I,   Dated : 23.08.2001
